0.1.name: wordpress/shadow-screen-options
0.1.description:
Shadow Screen Options is used in a multisite environment to allow blog-specific screen layout options for users. Blogs on which it is not active will share user-set preferences (the default WordPress behavior).

This is most useful in situations where users have several blogs, and have different sets of plugins active on each blog.
